channel.title: What ARE Universal Computers? :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script So what really is a universal computer? We’ve thrown that term around a little bit. We’ve also talked about what it means to be a truly general purpose computer or reprogrammable computer compared to a fixed program computer like what the original Difference Engine was. So, this is what made the ENIAC so unique as well as the mark one, although to a lesser extent.
